archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.3.5a: a) business applications (e.g. using templates instead of existing documents to create new electronic documents or using validation routines when developing spreadsheet-based applications)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
